task.Question: How many at bats did the Yankee with the most walks in the 1977 regular season have that same season?

Annotator Metadata.Steps:
1. Search "yankee stats" to find their MLB stats page.
2. Set the data to the 1977 regular season.
3. Sort to find the most walks.
4. See how many at bats the player had.

steps.content: How many at bats did the Yankee with the most walks in the 1977 regular season have that same season?

plan: Identify the player from the New York Yankees who had the most walks in the 1977 regular season.
Look up the statistics for that player for the 1977 season, specifically focusing on their number of at-bats.
Compile the information to provide the total number of at-bats for that player in the 1977 season.

given_facts: Yankee with the most walks in the 1977 regular season
facts_to_lookup: The player from the New York Yankees who had the most walks in the 1977 regular season and their total number of at-bats for that season.

serp.title: 1977 New York Yankees Statistics
serp.content: 1977 New York Yankees Statistics ; Record: 100-62-0, Finished 1st in AL_East (Schedule and Results) ; Postseason: Won World Series (4-2) over Los Angeles Dodgers

serp.title: 1977 New York Yankees season
serp.content: The 1977 New York Yankees season was the 75th season for the Yankees. The team won the World Series, which was the 21st title in franchise history.

serp.title: 1977 Yankees Player Hitting Stat Leaders
serp.content: The official source for New York Yankees player hitting stats, MLB home run leaders, batting average, OPS and stat leaders.

serp.title: 1977 New York Yankees - BR Bullpen
serp.content: The 1977 New York Yankees played the 75th season in team history. They finished in first place in the American League Eastern Division with a record of 100-62.

serp.title: 1977 New York Yankees Hitting Stats
serp.content: Which hitters from the 1977 New York Yankees played the most games by each position? C Thurman Munson (136), 1B Chris Chambliss (157), 2B Willie Randolph (147),Â ...

1977 New York Yankees Hitting Stats
===================================

The 1977 New York Yankees hitting stats seen on this page include hitting data for every player who appeared in a game during the 1977 season. Hits, doubles, triples, home runs, batting averages and more hitting stats are included for every player on the 1977 New York Yankees broken down by each hitter. Every player's name links to their career statistics.NOTE: You can easily SORT the hitting stats on the table by simply clicking on the title of the hitting stat. Example, click HR (home runs) and the hitting stat sorts from least to greatest. Click it again, greatest to least.

![Baseball Almanac Top Quote](/images/typewriter-with-paper.png)
